error.message: Call to deprecated function date_iso8601(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use date('c', $date) instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to micro_simple_sitemap.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
